attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2014-0969

Date: 2014-09-19

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Alain Beaudet, President, Canadian Institutes of Health Research, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 10 ($257,200 - $302,500), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Marc Bosc, Deputy Clerk, House of Commons, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 6 ($147,400 - $173,300), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Gérald Cossette, Director, Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 8 ($194,500 - $228,800), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Chad Gaffield, former President, Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 9 ($223,800 - $263,200), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Stevan Horvath, President, Canadian Centre for Occupational Health and Safety, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 5 ($128,100 - $150,700), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Harry James Kowal, Principal, Royal Military College of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 7 ($169,400 - $199,200), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Kevin S. MacLeod, Canadian Secretary to the Queen, Advisory Committee on Vice-Regal Appointments, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($147,400 - $173,300), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of André McArdle, Secretary, Canadian Intergovernmental Conference Secretariat, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 4 ($111,400 - $131,000), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Michel Perron, former Chief Executive Officer, Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 5 ($128,100 - $150,700), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of John Gregory Peters, Usher of the Black Rod, Senate, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 3 ($97,000 - $114,100), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of André Beaudet, Secretary, National Battlefields Commission, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 3 ($97,000 - $114,100), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Suzanne Clément, former Coordinator, Office of the Coordinator (Status of Women Canada), as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 7 ($169,400 - $199,200), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Richard Fujarczuk, former Law Clerk and Parliamentary Counsel, House of Commons, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 6 ($147,400 - $173,300), effective February 25, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Joel Jeffrey Sokolsky, former Principal, Royal Military College of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 7 ($169,400 - $199,200), effective July 31, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Sonia L'Heureux, Parliamentary Librarian, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 7 ($169,400 - $199,200), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Audrey Elizabeth O'Brien, Clerk of the House of Commons, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 8 ($194,500 - $228,800), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Gary William O'Brien, Clerk of the Senate and Clerk of the Parliaments, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 8 ($194,500 - $228,800), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Kevin Michael Vickers, Sergeant-at-Arms of the House of Commons, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 6 ($147,400 - $173,300), effective April 1, 2014.

    His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Hervé Déry, former Acting Librarian and Archivist of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 8 ($194,500 - $228,800), effective April 1, 2014.

    His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Hervé Déry, former Acting Librarian and Archivist of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 8 ($194,500 - $228,800), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Stephen Wallace, Secretary to the Governor General, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($190,500 - $224,100), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Thomas J. Lawson, Chief of the Defence Staff, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($245,400 - $288,600), effective April 1, 2014.
